name: Training_Gadgets.Training_and_Gadgets
display_help: Those who enter the Soldier training program are given crash courses in Teamwork, Tactical Analysis and Coordination of Assets.

powers.name: Training_Gadgets.Training_and_Gadgets.Wolf_Spider_Armor
powers.display_help: Your Wolf Spider Armor provides good protection to Smashing, Lethal and Psionic damage types, as well as offering basic levels of protection to most status effects, including Confuse, Fear, Disorient, Hold, Sleep and Immobilize effects.
powers.display_short_help: Auto: Self +RES(Smash, Lethal, Psionic, Status Effects)

display_info: 3.00% resistance to smashing damage, lethal damage for 10.25s on self
2.00% resistance to psionic damage for 10.25s on self
-2.0 confuse protection, terrorize protection, hold protection, immobilize protection, stun protection, sleep protection for 10s on target
500.00% resistance to sleep for 10s on target
3.00% resistance to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 10.25s on self
20.00% resistance to confuse, terrorize, hold, immobilize, stun for 10s on target
520.00% resistance to sleep for 10s on target
30.00% resistance to defense debuff, to hit debuff, recharge debuff for 0.75s on self
50.00% resistance to run speed debuff, fly speed debuff, jump speed debuff, jump height debuff for 0.75s on self

powers.name: Training_Gadgets.Training_and_Gadgets.Combat_Training:_Defensive
powers.display_help: You are more evasive to ranged attacks.

display_info: 7.50% strength to ranged for 0.75s on self
10.00% strength to accuracy for 0.75s on self
33.00% resistance to to hit debuff for 0.75s on self

powers.name: Training_Gadgets.Training_and_Gadgets.Tactical_Training:_Maneuvers
powers.display_help: A good leader knows how to protect his team. While active, this power increases the Defense of yourself and all nearby teammates to all attacks.

display_info.Aggro Type: Enemies will not notice this attack

display_info: 10.00% strength to ranged, melee, AoE, smashing, lethal, fire, cold, energy, negative energy, psionic, unique for 2.25s on target
10.00% strength to ranged, melee, AoE, smashing, lethal, fire, cold, energy, negative energy, psionic, unique for 2.25s on target

powers.name: Training_Gadgets.Training_and_Gadgets.Tactical_Training:_Assault
powers.display_help: While this power is active, you and your nearby teammates deal more damage and are more resistant to Taunt and Placate.

display_info.Aggro Type: Enemies will not notice this attack

display_info: 15.00% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 2.25s on target
60.55% resistance to taunt debuff, placate debuff for 2.25s on target

powers.name: Training_Gadgets.Training_and_Gadgets.Tactical_Training:_Leadership
powers.display_help: While this power is active, your chance to hit and that of all your nearby teammates' is increased. Your advanced Tactics also protect you and your team from Confuse and Fear effects. Additionally, your Perception is improved, allowing you to better detect Stealthy foes.
powers.display_short_help: Toggle: PBAoE, Team +To Hit, Res(Confuse, Fear), +Perception

display_info.Aggro Type: Enemies will not notice this attack

display_info: 51.90% resistance to perception radius debuff for 2.25s on target
60.55% resistance to confuse, terrorize for 2.25s on target
-5.2 confuse protection, terrorize protection for 2.25s on target
112.45% resistance to confuse, terrorize for 2.25s on target

powers.name: Training_Gadgets.Training_and_Gadgets.Mental_Training
powers.display_help: Your mental training allows you to focus your will, allowing you to move faster than normal, as well as resist slow effects. This power is always on and permanently increases your attack rate and movement speed.

display_info: 20.00% strength to recharge for 10.25s on self
40.00% resistance to run speed debuff, fly speed debuff, recharge debuff for 10.25s on self

powers.name: Training_Gadgets.Training_and_Gadgets.Call_Reinforcements
powers.display_help: As an Arachnos Soldier you have access to a small squadron of Arachnobot Disruptors. Two Disruptors that are one level less than you will show up when summoned.
